summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 1, 4, 5, 6, 6.1, 7 and 8 and repealing Section 9 of Ordinance 88522 (Sick Leave); amending Section 5 of Ordinance 83834 (Health Care Program); amending Section 2 of Ordinance 90789 (Retirement Sick Leave); and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 99753 (Funeral Leave) to confirm to extend benefits to certain employees, and to provide for administration of such benefits by the Personnel Director.
